cause.description:
YouthServe is the largest youth service organization in Birmingham bringing youth, ages 13-18 from all walks of life and from all over Birmingham together to participate in community service and social change. YouthServe hosts monthly Saturday workdays, after school projects, four camps in the summer, teaches a service learning curriculum in area schools and facilitates a year long youth philanthropy project. Whew, that's a lot. And we have fun doing it. Plus, we have great t-shirts that we give out.
YouthServe hosts Community Action Projects one Saturday a month. All young people, ages 13-18 are invited. At YouthServe we believe that change is a group project, which means everyone must be involved.
We believe in picking up a hammer or shovel and working side by side with each other to get things done to make our corner of this world a better place. And we could use your help
